  NAME
    ukernel_default
  SRCS
    "mmt4d.c"
    "mmt4d_tile.c"

    "pack_tile.c"
    "query_tile_sizes.c"

    "common.h"
    "mmt4d.h"
    "mmtd_internal.h"
    "pack.h"
    "pack_internal.h"

    "unpack_internal.h"
  COPTS
    "-std=c17"
    "-nostdinc"
    "-ffreestanding"
    "-O3"
    "-fno-ident"
    "-fdiscard-value-names"
    "-c"
    "-emit-llvm"
    "-DIREE_DEVICE_STANDALONE=1"
    "-DNDEBUG"
  HEADER_PATHS
    "${IREE_BINARY_DIR}/runtime/src"
    "${IREE_SOURCE_DIR}/runtime/src"
  PUBLIC
)
